original: tataḥ pra- tisvaṃ pañcajñānānāṃ yadā pṛthivyādicaturdhātuvāsanābhedaḥ kāyo'pi viṃ- śatyaṅgurīparipūrṇastadā viṃśatyākārābhisambodhiḥ

original: kṛtvā pūjāṃ vicitrāma- paradaśavidhāṃ cātmaśaktyā yathoktāmācāryasyāṃgrimūle dadāti varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuḍihetoḥ ||
analyzed: kṛtvā pūjām para daśavidhām ca ātma śaktyā yathā uktām ācāryasya aṃgri mūle dadāti vara sutaḥ dakṣiṇām śuḍi hetoḥ

original: iha pūrvoktavidhānena devatāvalambanaṃ kṛtvā tato jñānacakraṃ samayacakreṇa sahaikīkṛtyārghādikaṃ dattvā pūrvamantrapadaiḥ |
analyzed: iha pūrva ukta vidhānena devatā avalambanam kṛtvā tatas jñānacakram samayacakreṇa saha ekīkṛtya argha ādikam dattvā pūrva mantra padaiḥ

original: tato- 'rcanārtha prathamaṃ gandhacandanādikaṃ gṛhītvā 'ṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ bāhace kṛtamaṇḍale nāyakādīnarcayet |
analyzed: tatas ṛcana artha prathamam gandha candana ādikam gṛhītvā ṅguṣṭha anāmikābhyām bāhace kṛta maṇḍale nāyaka ādīn arcayet

original: sarveṣāṃ nāmapūrvapraṇavaṃ deyamarcane sarva- karmaṇi namo 'nte nāmni bhavati pratyekakarmaṇi puṣṭayādau svāhā 'ntato veditavya iti |
analyzed: sarveṣām nāma pūrva praṇavam deyam arcane sarva karmaṇi namaḥ nte nāmni bhavati pratyeka karmaṇi puṣṭayā ādau svāhā ntataḥ veditavyaḥ iti
iti sarva karmaṇi arcanīya devatānām mantra padāni tat yathā mūlatantre

original: tato ratnendra- nīlādibhirhamapuṣpairbahuvidhagharaiḥ paścavarṇairvastrairgandhadhūpapradīpairghaṇṭādaśaiṃrvi- tānairvividhaphalaiḥ pañcavarṇapatākābhirnṛtyairvādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvāpi daśavidhā- miti tantroktām
analyzed: tatas ratna indra nīla ādibhiḥ hama puṣpaiḥ bahuvidha gharaiḥ paśca varṇaiḥ vastraiḥ gandha dhūpa pradīpaiḥ tānaiḥ vividha phalaiḥ pañca varṇa patākābhiḥ nṛtyaiḥ vādyaiḥ pūjām kṛtvā api

original: eva śiṣyo yathātmaśaktyā yathoktapūjāṃ kṛtvā tata ācāryasyāṃghrimūle maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā dadāti varasuto dakṣiṇāṃ śuddhi- hetoḥ
analyzed: eva śiṣyaḥ yathā ātma śaktyā yathā ukta pūjām kṛtvā tatas ācāryasya aṃghri mūle maṇḍalam kṛtvā dadāti vara sutaḥ dakṣiṇām hetoḥ

original: dravyātmānaṃ triśuḍyā sasutaduhitaraṃ kanyakāṃ gotrajānyām adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇamadhigato raudrasaṃsārabhītaḥ
analyzed: dravya ātmānam triśuḍyā sa suta duhitaram kanyakām gotra jā anyām adya eva aham jinānām śaraṇam adhigataḥ raudra saṃsāra bhītaḥ

original: yuṣmatpādābjayorvai bhavabhayaharayoḥ kāyavāścittaśuddhyā ityadhyeṣyo guruḥ syātsakanakakusumairmaṇḍalaṃ kārayitvā
analyzed: yuṣmad pāda abjayoḥ vai bhava bhaya harayoḥ iti adhyeṣyaḥ guruḥ syāt sa kanaka kusumaiḥ maṇḍalam kārayitvā
dravya ātmānam triśuḍayā

original: kāyavāñcittaśuddhyā sasutaduhitaraṃ dadāti kanyakāṃ gotrajānyāṃ yadi svakīyā nāsti
analyzed: kāyavān citta śuddhyā sa suta duhitaram dadāti kanyakām gotra jā anyām yadi svakīyā na asti

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tato'- dhyeṣaṇāṃ karoti praṇidhānaṃ ca
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇām dattvā tatas dhyeṣaṇām karoti praṇidhānam ca

original: adyaivāhaṃ jinānāṃ śaraṇamadhigata ābodhasīmnaḥ yuṣmatpādābjayorvai bhavabhayaharayoḥ kāyavāñcittaśuddhyā ityadhyeṣyo guruḥ syātsakanakakusumairmaṇḍalaṃ kārayitvā
analyzed: adya eva aham jinānām śaraṇam adhigataḥ ābodha sīmnaḥ yuṣmad pāda abjayoḥ vai bhava bhaya harayoḥ kāyavān citta śuddhyā iti adhyeṣyaḥ guruḥ syāt sa kanaka kusumaiḥ maṇḍalam kārayitvā

original: tataḥ praṇidhānaṃ karoti vajraṃ ghaṇṭāṃ ca mudrāṃ gurumapi śirasā dhārayāmīṣṭavajre dānaṃ dāsyāmi ratne jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmyatra cakre
analyzed: tatas praṇidhānam karoti vajram ghaṇṭām ca mudrām gurum api śirasā dhārayāmi iṣṭa vajre dānam dāsyāmi ratne jinavara samayam pālayāmi atra cakre

original: pūjāṃ khaḍge karomi sphuṭajalajakule saṃvaraṃ pālayāmi sattvānāṃ mokṣahetorjinajanakakule bodhimutpādyāmi
analyzed: pūjām khaḍge karomi sphuṭa jalaja kule saṃvaram pālayāmi sattvānām mokṣa hetoḥ jina janaka kule bodhim utpādyāmi

original: vajraṃ ghaṇṭāṃ ca mudrāṃ gurumapi śirasā dhārayāmīṣṭavatre vajrakule sthita idaṃ samayaṃ gṛhṇāmi
analyzed: vajram ghaṇṭām ca mudrām gurum api śirasā dhārayāmi iṣṭa vatre vajra kule sthitaḥ idam samayam gṛhṇāmi
dānam dāsyāmi
ratne kule sthitaḥ
puṇya sambhārāya daśavidham dānam dāsyāmi

original: loharatnānnagovājigajakanyāvasu- ndhareṣṭabhāryākhamāṃsāni dānaṃ daśavidhaṃ matamiti cintāmaṇiṃ sādhayitvā dāsyāmīti praṇidhānaṃ jinavarasamayaṃ pālayāmyatra cakre
analyzed: loha ratna anna go vāji gaja kanyā vasu ndharā iṣṭa bhāryā kha māṃsāni dānam daśavidham matam iti cintāmaṇim sādhayitvā dāsyāmi iti praṇidhānam jinavara samayam pālayāmi atra cakre

original: cakrakule sthitaḥ pañcāmṛtādyagokudahanaṃ skandhendriyasamūhaṃ rakṣāmīti praṇidhānaṃ
analyzed: cakra kule sthitaḥ pañca amṛta ādya go ku dahanam skandha indriya samūham rakṣāmi iti praṇidhānam

original: pūjāṃ khaḍge karomi khaḍṅgakule sthitaḥ saṅguruvuḍabodhisattvānāmanyeṣāmapi pujāṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ karomīti praṇidhānam
analyzed: pūjām khaḍge karomi khaḍṅga kule sthitaḥ saṅguru vuḍa bodhisattvānām anyeṣām api pujām sarva upakaraṇaiḥ karomi iti praṇidhānam
sphuṭa jalaja kule padma kule sthitaḥ
varṇa avarṇa abhigamana sphuṭa padma samparke saṃvaram brahmacārya pālayāmi iti
śīla sambhārāya iti praṇidhānam karomi

original: sattvānāṃ mokṣahetorjinotpāda- kakula ekaśūlavajrasthaḥ śūnyatākarkāruṇātmakāṃ mahāmudrāsiddhāṃ bodhimaha- mutpādyāmi
analyzed: sattvānām mokṣa hetoḥ jina utpāda ka kule eka śūla vajra sthaḥ śūnyatā karkāruṇa ātmakām mahāmudrā siddhām bodhim aham utpādyāmi

original: snāto gandhānulipto vrataniyamayutaḥ pūrvabhūmyāṃ niveśya siddhārtha dantakāṣṭhaṃ jinavarakuliśaiścābhimantrya pradeyam
analyzed: snātaḥ gandha anuliptaḥ vrata niyama yutaḥ pūrva bhūmyām niveśya siddhārtha dantakāṣṭham jinavara kuliśaiḥ ca abhimantrya pradeyam

original: jihvāyāṃ cāmṛtaṃ vai jinavarasamayairdhūpamāveśanārtham mantraṃ hūṃkāramekamaralayasahitaṃ codanaṃ krodhabhartuḥ
analyzed: jihvāyām ca amṛtam vai jinavara samayaiḥ dhūpam āveśana artham mantram hūṃkāram ekam ara laya sahitam codanam krodhabhartuḥ

original: iti praṇidhāne kṛte satyabhiṣekāya prārthito guruḥ śiṣyaṃ snātaṃ gandhānuliptaṃ vrataniyamayutaṃ pūrvabhūmyāṃ maṇḍalabāhye niveśya siddhyartha dantakāṣṭhaṃ pūrvoktavidhinā jinavarakuliśairiti āḥ hūṃ ebhiḥ saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā tallālayitvā maṇḍale kṣipet
analyzed: iti praṇidhāne kṛte satya abhiṣekāya prārthitaḥ guruḥ śiṣyam snātam gandha anuliptam vrata niyama yutam pūrva bhūmyām maṇḍala bāhye niveśya siddhi artha dantakāṣṭham pūrva ukta vidhinā
yena diś vibhāgena patati tad karma prasaraḥ tasya sidhyati
pūrva ukta śānti ādi kam aṣṭa dikṣu

original: tato mukhe culukatrayamudakasya prakṣipya śuddhiṃ kṛtvā maṇḍale kaṇṭhapaṭaṃ dattvā pūrvabhūmyāmānayitvā śiṣyaṃ tatastasya jihvāyāṃ pañcāmṛtaṃ dyājjinavarasamayaiḥ
analyzed: tatas mukhe culuka trayam udakasya prakṣipya śuddhim kṛtvā maṇḍale kaṇṭha paṭam dattvā pūrva bhūmyām ānayitvā śiṣyam tatas tasya jihvāyām pañcāmṛtam dyāt jinavara samayaiḥ

original: pañcāmṛtapañcapradīpaiḥ pūrva dhūpaṃ sādhayitvā tadeva dhūpaṃ devatāveśanārtha tanmantraṃ hūṃkāramekam
analyzed: pañcāmṛta pañcapradīpaiḥ dhūpam sādhayitvā tat eva dhūpam devatā āveśana artha tad mantram hūṃkāram ekam
ara laya sahitam iti

original: oṃarararara lalalala vajrāveśaya hūṃ ityanena mantreṇa codanaṃ krodhabhartuḥ
analyzed: om ararararara lalalala vajra āveśaya hūm iti anena mantreṇa codanam krodhabhartuḥ
krodha āveśam iti arthaḥ

original: asya koṭijāpena daśalakṣahomena pūrvasevāṃ kuryātsmaraṇasā- dṛśakrodhāveśaṃ karoti tasyedaṃ lakṣaṇam
analyzed: asya koṭi jāpena daśa lakṣa homena pūrva sevām kuryāt smaraṇasā dṛśa krodha āveśam karoti tasya idam lakṣaṇam
āviṣṭaḥ krodha rājaḥ praharaṇa sva karaiḥ starjayan māra vṛndam iti

original: iha śiṣye krodharāja āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśo- bhitakaraiḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ yaṃ hanti taṃ śataścaṇḍaṃ karoti
analyzed: iha śiṣye krodha rājaḥ āviṣṭaḥ san praharaṇaśas sthāvaram jaṅgamam yam hanti tam śata ścaṇḍam karoti

original: yaṃ tarjayati tarjavyā māravṛndaṃ dharmaviheṭhakaṃ taṃ bhūmyāṃ pātayati niśceṣṭhitatāṃ nayati
analyzed: yam tarjayati tarjavyā māra vṛndam dharma viheṭhakam tam bhūmyām pātayati niśceṣṭhita tām nayati
tathā pratyālīḍha ādi padaiḥ bahuvidha karaṇaiḥ nṛtyate vajranṛtyam iti

original: iha yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prākkiścinnāṭyalakṣaṇaṃ na jānāti sa eva krodhaṃ viṣṭaḥ san vajranṛtyaṃ karotītyantarīkṣe bahuvidhakaraṇairiti nṛtyate 'tha hāsyaṃ karoti tadā haṃkāramiśra bhayadadmapi ripormārasamūhasyeti
analyzed: iha yaḥ śiṣyaḥ prāk kiścid nāṭya lakṣaṇam na jānāti saḥ eva krodham viṣṭaḥ san vajra nṛtyam karoti iti antarīkṣe bahuvidha karaṇaiḥ iti nṛtyate hāsyam karoti tadā haṃkāra miśra
tathā pūrvam ajñaḥ yaḥ śiṣyaḥ
sa krodha āviṣṭaḥ manuṣya ādīnām agamya dhvaninā gītām karoti
aneka tantra antareṣu yat uktam iti

original: ataḥ krodharājāviṣṭo nirlajjo nirviśaṅkako bhavati guṇavaśātkrodhasvabhāvāt
analyzed: atas krodha rāja āviṣṭaḥ nirlajjaḥ nirviśaṅkakaḥ bhavati guṇa vaśāt krodha svabhāvāt

original: devatā'nyā'pi saumyā ityatha locanādi- devatā saumyā iti krodhāveśaniyamaḥ
analyzed: devatā saumyā iti atha locana ādi devatā saumyā iti krodha āveśa niyamaḥ
atra api vistareṇa apara daśa krodhānām daśa prakṛtayaḥ mudrā bandhena vā uditavyāḥ

original: yena cihnena yasyotpādaḥ sā ca tasya hastamudrā bhavati sa tayā jñātavya iti niyamaḥ
analyzed: yena cihnena yasya utpādaḥ sā ca tasya hasta mudrā bhavati sa tayā jñātavyaḥ iti niyamaḥ
anyat āveśa lakṣaṇam vistara bhayāt na uktam
idānīm āveśa upaśamana ādikam ucyate

original: tyaktāveśasya paścācchirasi ca hṛdaye mūni nābhau ca kaṇṭhe guhye rakṣāṃ jinaiśca svabhūmigataiḥ kāraye- tsvatrivatraiḥ
analyzed: tyaktāveśasya paścāt śirasi ca hṛdaye nābhau ca kaṇṭhe guhye rakṣām jinaiḥ ca sva bhūmi gataiḥ kāraye tsva trivatraiḥ
datta aṅge pīta vastrasya pihita nayanasya atra śiṣyasya veśaḥ
saṃvṛti artha vratāni pravara gati galāni eva deyāni tāni

analyzed: evam lohāni ratnāni vana oṣadhyāḥ sasyāni gandha dravyāṇi ghaṭeṣu kṣiptvā taiḥ paścavim śatibhiḥ punar pohalikām vaḍyā vijaya śaṃkhe kṣipet toya pūrṇe tena paśñcasu janmasthāneṣu abhiṣecayet

original: evaṃ sphiccha ke kaṭisandhau tataḥ kuladevatāviśodhanāya puṣpakṣepamantraḥ
analyzed: evam kaṭi sandhau tatas kuladevatā viśodhanāya puṣpa kṣepa mantraḥ

original: oṃ sarvatathā- gatakulaviśodhani svāhā anena mantreṇācāryaḥ puṣpamokṣaṃ śivyaṃ kārayet
analyzed: om sarva tathā gata kula viśodhani svāhā anena mantreṇa ācāryaḥ puṣpa mokṣam śivyam kārayet
anena mantreṇa cakṣuḥ udghāṭanam
om divya nayanam udghāṭayāmi svāhā iti
tatas kuladevatā maṇḍala nāyakam ādim kṛtvā darśayet maṇḍalam samastam

original: tataḥ pūrvadvāre kulaśuddhiṃ kṛtvā''cāryaḥ śiṣyaṃ vāmahastena sañcālya karmavajriṇā sārdhaṃ pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvottaradvāre nītvā tatra kāyaśuḍayartha tārādevīmantraiḥ sarvakalaśeṣu toyaṃ gṛhītvā vijayaśaṃkhe prakṣipyodakābhiṣeke punaḥ paścasu janmasthāneṣvabhiṣecayet
analyzed: tatas pūrva dvāre kula śuddhim kṛtvā cāryaḥ śiṣyam vāma hastena sañcālya karma vajriṇā sārdham pradakṣiṇām kṛtvā uttara dvāre nītvā tatra tārā devī mantraiḥ sarva kalaśeṣu toyam gṛhītvā

original: anena mantreṇa oṃ āī ṛ ālu paścadhātu- viśodhani svāhā
analyzed: anena mantreṇa om āī ṛ ālu paścadhātu viśodhani svāhā
tatas mukuṭa abhiṣeke janmasthāneṣu abhiṣecayet

original: anena mantreṇa oṃ ai ṛ u lu pañścatathāgatapariśuddha svāhā
analyzed: anena mantreṇa om ai ṛ u lu pañśca tathāgata pariśuddha svāhā

original: tato ratnahemamukuṭaṃ vastramukuṭaṃ vā bandhayedevamabhiṣekadvayena dhātuskandhaviśu- ḍacaiva kāthaviśuddhirbhavati
analyzed: tatas ratna hema mukuṭam vastra mukuṭam vā bandhayet evam abhiṣeka dvayena kātha viśuddhiḥ bhavati

original: kāyavajrabhūmyāṃ kāyaviśuddhiṃ kṛtvā tato dakṣiṇāvartena punardakṣiṇadvāre vāgviśuḍayartha nītvā śiṣyaṃ paścasu janma- sthāneṣvabhiṣicya paṭṭābhiṣeka anena mantreṇa oṃ a ā aṃ aḥ ha hā haṃ haḥ ho keṃ daśapāramitāparipūraṇi svāheti
analyzed: kāya vajra bhūmyām kāya viśuddhim kṛtvā tatas dakṣiṇa āvartena punar dakṣiṇa dvāre nītvā śiṣyam paścasu janma sthāneṣu abhiṣicya paṭṭābhiṣeka anena mantreṇa om a ā aṃ aḥ ha hā haṃ

original: tato ratnapahuṃ suvarṇapaṭṭa vā''lābhe puṣpamālāṃ lalāṭe bandhayediti
analyzed: tatas suvarṇa paṭṭa vā lābhe puṣpa mālām lalāṭe bandhayet iti
tatas vajra vajraghaṇṭā abhiṣeke pañcasu janmasthāneṣu abhiṣicya anena mantreṇa

original: oṃ hūṃ ho sūryacandraviśo- dhaka svāheti
analyzed: om ho sūrya candra viśaḥ dhaka svāhā iti

original: tato vajravajradhaṇṭāṃ śirasi datvā śaṃkhodakenābhiṣecaye- diti
analyzed: tatas vajra vajra dhaṇṭām śirasi da tvā śaṃkha udakena abhiṣecaye iti

original: tato'bhiṣekadvayena vāgvajraṃ śodhayitvā vajrāṅguṣṭhaṃ datvā dakṣiṇā- vartena punaḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā pūrvavaktre cittavajraviśodhanārtha pañcasu janma- sthāneṣvabhiṣecayet
analyzed: tatas bhiṣeka dvayena vāc vajram śodhayitvā vajrāṅguṣṭham da tvā dakṣiṇā vartena punar pradakṣiṇām kṛtvā pūrva vaktre citta vajra viśodhana artha pañcasu janma sthāneṣu abhiṣecayet

original: vajravratābhiṣeka anena mantreṇa oṃ a ā e jhai ar ār o au al āl viṣayendriyaviśodhani svāhā
analyzed: vajravrata abhiṣeka anena mantreṇa om a ā e jhai ar ār o au al āl viṣaya indriya viśodhani svāhā

original: tataḥ śrotrā- diṣu puṣpaṃ datvā punarnāmābhiṣeke pañcasu janmasthāneṣvabhiṣicyānena mantreṇa oṃ ha hā ya yārarā bavāla lā caturbrahmavihāraviśuddha svāheti
analyzed: tatas śrotra ā diṣu puṣpam da tvā punar nāma abhiṣeke pañcasu janmasthāneṣu abhiṣicya anena mantreṇa om ha hā ya yārarā bavāla lā catur brahmavihāra viśuddha svāhā iti

original: tato hastapādeṣu puṣpamālāṃ baḍvā kaṭakanūpurādīnāmabhāve tato nāmābhiṣekena vyākuryāt
analyzed: tatas hasta pādeṣu puṣpa mālām baḍvā kaṭaka nūpura ādīnām abhāve tatas nāma abhiṣekena vyākuryāt

original: amukavajrasthamiti kṛtvā tato jñāna- viśuddhinimittaṃ cittavajraṃ śodhayitvā'bhiṣekadvayena punardakṣiṇāvartena śiṣyamānayitvā paścimavaktre paścasu sthāneṣvanajñābhiṣeke'bhiṣicyānena mantreṇa oṃ haṃ kṣaṃ dharmacakrapravartaka svāheti
analyzed: amuka vajra stham iti kṛtvā tatas jñāna viśuddhi nimittam citta vajram śodhayitvā bhiṣeka dvayena punar dakṣiṇa āvartena śiṣyam ānayitvā paścima vaktre paścasu sthāneṣu anajñā abhiṣeke bhiṣicya

original: abhiṣekaṃ dattvā kāyavāk- cittajñānavajrāṇi saptābhiṣekairviśodhya tataḥ śiṣyāya vajraṃ vajraghaṇṭāṃ kare dattvā amukavajra tābhyāmācāryo vajraghaṇṭāṃ pradāya pravarakaruṇayā dāpayecchuḍadharmamityanena sārdhaślokadvayena tadyathā
analyzed: abhiṣekam dattvā kāya vāc citta jñāna vajrāṇi sapta abhiṣekaiḥ viśodhya tatas śiṣyāya vajram vajraghaṇṭām kare dattvā amuka vajra tābhyām ācāryaḥ vajraghaṇṭām pradāya pravara karuṇayā

original: kuryātprāṇātipātaṃ khalu kuliśakule'satyavākyaṃ ca khaḍge ratne hārya parasvaṃ varakamalakule'pyeva hāryā parastrī
analyzed: kuryāt prāṇa atipātam khalu kuliśa kule satya vākyam ca khaḍge ratne para svam vara kamala kule pi eva hāryā para strī

original: madyaṃ dīpaśca buddhāḥ svasakalaviṣayāḥ sevanīyāḥ svacakre ḍoḻyādyāḥ kārtikāyāṃ svasakalavanitā nāvamanyā svapadye
analyzed: madyam dīpaḥ ca buddhāḥ sva sakala viṣayāḥ sevanīyāḥ sva cakre ḍo ya ādyāḥ kārtikāyām sva sakala vanitā na avamanyā svapadye

original: deyā sattvārthahetoḥ sādhanatanuriyaṃ na tvayā rakṣaṇīyā buddhatvaṃ nānyathā vai bhavati kulasutānantakalpairjinoktam
analyzed: deyā sattva artha hetoḥ sādhana tanuḥ iyam na tvayā rakṣaṇīyā buddhatvam nā anyathā vai bhavati kula suta ananta kalpaiḥ jina uktam

original: toyaṃ tārādidevyo mukuṭa iha jināḥ śaktayo vīrapaṭṭaḥ vajraghaṇṭārkacandrau vratamapiviṣayā nāmamaitryādiyogaḥ
analyzed: toyam tārā ādi devyaḥ mukuṭaḥ iha jināḥ śaktayaḥ vīrapaṭṭaḥ vajra ghaṇṭā arka candrau vratam api viṣayāḥ nāma maitrī ādi yogaḥ

original: ājñāsambodhilakṣmīrbhavabhayamathanī kālacakrānuviddhā ete saptābhiṣekāḥ kaluṣamalaharā maṇḍale sampradeyāḥ
analyzed: ājñā sambodhi lakṣmīḥ bhava bhaya mathanī kālacakra anuviddhā ete sapta abhiṣekāḥ kaluṣa mala harāḥ maṇḍale sampradeyāḥ

original: iti saptābhiṣekavidhiṃ maṇḍale kṛtvā tataḥ śiṣyāya buḍādhiṣṭhānaṃ cintayedācāryaḥ
analyzed: iti sapta abhiṣeka vidhim maṇḍale kṛtvā tatas śiṣyāya buḍa adhiṣṭhānam cintayet ācāryaḥ
jyeṣṭha kaniṣṭha ādi artham

original: saṃvatsarādikasudgho bhiṣeko rūpādiviṣayacakṣurādīndriyasaṃśuḍiḥ prākṛtaviṣayaniyamena mahā- mudrāsiddhiprāpakatvādvajravratābhiṣekaḥ pañcamaḥ
analyzed: bhiṣekaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya cakṣuḥ ādi indriya saṃśuḍiḥ prākṛta viṣaya niyamena mahā mudrā siddhi prāpaka tvāt vajravrata abhiṣekaḥ pañcamaḥ

original: brāhmaṇādivarṇānāmeka- kalkatvābhiprāyeṇāsukavajra iti nāmakaraṇānmaitryādicaturbrahmavihārapari- pūrtyā sarvakālaṃ rāgadveṣādiviśuddhirnivāraṇatveneti nāmābhiṣekaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādi varṇānām eka kalka tva abhiprāyeṇa āsuka vajraḥ iti nāmakaraṇāt maitrī ādi catur brahmavihāra pari pūrtyā sarvakālam rāga dveṣa ādi viśuddhiḥ nivāraṇa tvena iti nāma abhiṣekaḥ

original: aparimitasattvadhātoryathāśayavaśena saṃvṛtiparamārthavibhāgena paramaguhya- vajrayānadeśanārthamanujñābhiṣeko buddhatvaniṣpādakaḥ saptamaḥ
analyzed: aparimita sattvadhātoḥ yathā āśaya vaśena saṃvṛti parama artha vibhāgena param aguhya vajrayāna deśanā artham anujñā abhiṣekaḥ buddhatva niṣpādakaḥ saptamaḥ

original: ete saptābhi- ṣekā rajomaṇḍalaṃ vihāya nānyatra paṭādimaṇḍale deyāḥ kumbhādyastu sekamaṇḍalavartanamantareṇāpi deyāḥ
analyzed: ete sapta abhiṣekāḥ rajaḥ maṇḍalam vihāya na anyatra paṭa ādi maṇḍale deyāḥ kumbha ādyaḥ tu seka maṇḍala vartanam antareṇa api deyāḥ

original: pūrvoddiṣṭaikādaśasekānāṃ madhye laukikalokottarasiḍisaudhasopānabhūtānadharasaṃvṛtirūpānsaptasekānvyā- khyāya yogisaṃvṛtibhūtāṃ laukikasiḍisādhanān paramārthānukulāṃstri- vidhasekān kumbhetyādinoddiśati
analyzed: pūrva uddiṣṭa ekādaśa sekānām madhye laukika lokottara siḍi saudha sopāna bhūtān adhara saṃvṛti rūpān sapta sekān vyā khyāya yogi saṃvṛti bhūtām laukika siḍi sādhanān paramārtha anukulān

original: digvarṣa yāvadekā bhavati daśavidhā darśanasparśanīyā tasmādāliṅganīyāḥ sarasajaladhayaḥ sevanīyāśca lābhyāḥ
analyzed: diś varṣa yāvat ekā bhavati daśavidhā darśana sparśanīyā tasmāt āliṅganīyāḥ sarasa jaladhayaḥ sevanīyāḥ ca lābhyāḥ

original: viṃśaddharbordhvamudrā paramabhayakarā krodhabhūtāsurāṃśā sekārtha ṣaṭcatasraḥ samasukhaphaladāścāparā bhāvanārtham
analyzed: viṃśat dharba ūrdhva mudrā parama bhaya karā krodha bhūta asura aṃśā seka artha ṣaṣ catasraḥ sama sukha phala dāḥ ca aparāḥ bhāvanā artham

original: śrīprajñāsparśanaṃ yatprathamamapi kuce kumbhasekaḥ sa eva guhyādguhyābhiṣeko bhavati śaśadharāsvādanālokanābhyām
analyzed: śrī prajñā sparśanam yat prathamam api kuce kumbha sekaḥ saḥ eva guhyāt guhya abhiṣekaḥ bhavati śaśadhara āsvādana ālokanābhyām

original: prajñājñānābhiṣeke sakalajinakulaiḥ śodhayitvāṅgavaktrai- rmudrā śiṣyāya deyā jinamapi guruṇā sākṣiṇaṃ cātra kṛtvā
analyzed: prajñā jñāna abhiṣeke sakala jina kulaiḥ śodhayitvā aṅga vaktraiḥ rmudrā śiṣyāya deyā jinam api guruṇā sākṣiṇam ca atra kṛtvā

original: sarvālaṅkārayuktāṃ drutakanakanibhāṃ dvādaśābdāṃ sukanyām prajñopāyātmakena svakuliśamaṇinā kāmayitvā sarāgām
analyzed: sarva alaṅkāra yuktām druta kanaka nibhām dvādaśa abdām su kanyām prajñā upāya ātmakena sva kuliśa maṇinā kāmayitvā sa rāgām

original: jñātvā śiṣyasya śuddhi kuliśamapi mukhe kṣepayitvā sabījam paścāddeyā svamudrā tvatha punaraparā dhūmamārgādiyuktā
analyzed: jñātvā śiṣyasya kuliśam api mukhe kṣepayitvā sa bījam paścāt deyā sva mudrā tu atha punar aparā dhūma mārga ādi yuktā

original: trastā vibhrāntacittā śabdā paravaśagā vyādhiyuktā prasūtā
analyzed: trastā vibhrānta cittā śabdā para vaśagā vyādhi yuktā prasūtā

original: krodhā stambhārthalobhā'nṛtakalaharatā svāṅgahīnā viśuḍā | etāḥ prajñābhiṣeke khanipuṇaguruṇā varjanīyā narendra pūrvoktā buddhabhaktā gurusamayadharā sarvadā vandanīyāḥ
analyzed: stambha artha lobhā nṛta kalaha ratā sva aṅga hīnā viśuḍā etāḥ prajñā abhiṣeke kha nipuṇa guruṇā varjanīyāḥ narendra pūrva uktāḥ buddha bhaktāḥ guru samaya dharā sarvadā vandanīyāḥ
idānīm uttara abhiṣeka vidhānam kalaśa ādi trayam uttara sekaḥ ucyate
iham kalaśa ādi seka artham

original: mudrāṃ daśavarṣa yāvadvarjayetkumārikāṃ yata ekā prajñā- pāramitā daśavidhā bhavati dānādiviśuḍyā prativarṣikā
analyzed: mudrām yāvat varjayet kumārikām yatas ekā prajñā pāramitāḥ daśavidhā bhavati dāna ādi viśuḍyā prativarṣikā
atra api yāvat danta pātaḥ na bhavati tāvat jñāna dhātuḥ avyaya tvāt
evam dhātu drayena kumārikā kṣatayoniḥ

original: sā tena darśa- nīyā sparśanīyā pūjanīyeti tasmāddaśavarṣādekādaśavarṣamādiṃ kṛtvā yāvaddhiṃśativarṣāṇyāliṅganīyā ṣadbhiḥ saha catasraḥ sevanīyā vāyudhātvā- dadyaḥ
analyzed: sā tena darśa sparśanīyā pūjanīyā iti tasmāt daśa varṣāt ekādaśa varṣam ādim kṛtvā yāvat hiṃśati varṣāṇi āliṅganīyā sadbhiḥ saha catasraḥ sevanīyāḥ vāyu dhātvā dadyaḥ
atas vāyudhātuḥ ekādaśa varṣe

original: ataḥ pūrvābhiṣeke tāvat trastā vi- bhrāntādidoṣarahitā dvādaśābdādisukanyā paripācitā śiṣyeṇa guroḥ samarpanīyā
analyzed: atas pūrva abhiṣeke tāvat trastā bhrānta ādi doṣa rahitā dvādaśa abda ādi su kanyā paripācitā śiṣyeṇa guroḥ samarpanīyā

original: tato'dhyeṣaṇādikaṃ kṛtvā śiṣyo gurumadhyeṣayati vakṣya- māṇastutyā
analyzed: tatas dhyeṣaṇa ādikam kṛtvā śiṣyaḥ gurum adhyeṣayati vakṣya māṇa stutyā

original: tatastuṣṭo gururlokasaṃvṛtyā stanasparśanaṃ kārayatti svamudrā- yāstena kalaśābhiṣekaḥ sa eva
analyzed: tatas tuṣṭaḥ guruḥ loka saṃvṛtyā stana sparśanam kārayatti sva mudrāḥ yāḥ tena kalaśa abhiṣekaḥ saḥ eva

original: tato guhyapūjāṃ kṛtvā śiṣyāyāmṛtaṃ dadāti mudrāravindaṃ cālokayati tena guhyābhiṣeko bhavati
analyzed: tatas guhya pūjām kṛtvā śiṣyāya amṛtam dadāti mudrā aravindam ca ālokayati tena guhya abhiṣekaḥ bhavati
śaśa dharā āsvādana ālokanābhyām

original: tataḥ prajñābhiṣeke paścakulakalāpinīṃ kṛtvā oṃkārādibījaistato mudrā śiṣyāya deyā pāṇivyāptidvandvakaraṇāya ca guruṇā jinaṃ vajrasattvaṃ sākṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā yathāyaṃ durbhagaḥ sattvo'syādhi- kārāya bhavanādike tantraśrāvaṇāya śiṣyāṇāṃ tantradeśanāya maṇḍala- lekhanāyeti
analyzed: tatas prajñā abhiṣeke paśca kula kalāpinīm kṛtvā oṃkāra ādi bījaiḥ tatas mudrā śiṣyāya deyā pāṇi vyāpti dvandva karaṇāya ca guruṇā jinam vajra sattvam sākṣiṇam kṛtvā yathā ayam

prathama seka prāpta tvāt yogī payodhara abhiṣiktaḥ bālaḥ iti ucyate

original: vikalpabhāvanārahita- tvāditi bhāvo yaḥ pratyāhāreṇa dṛṣṭaḥ sa bhāvo na bhāvaḥ syādvikalpā- tītānāgatavartamānabhāvābhāvadarśanāditi |

original: ato vikalpabhāvanā no- palabhyate pratyāhārabhavanāyāmiti bhagavato vākyam |
analyzed: atas vikalpa bhāvanā na upalabhyate pratyāhāra bhavanāyām iti bhagavataḥ vākyam
iyam ca bhāvanā prajñāpāramitāyām api bhagavatā uktā
tat yathā

original: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocadya āryasubhūte'tra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yo- gamāpsyate ka sa yogamāpsyate |
analyzed: atha khalu śakraḥ devānām indraḥ āyuṣmantam subhūtim etat avocat yaḥ ārya subhūte prajñāpāramitāyām yaḥ gam āpsyate ka sa yogam āpsyate
subhūtiḥ āha
ākāśe sa kauśika yogam āpsyate

original: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpsyate'bhyavakāśe sa kau- śiko yogamāptukāmo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ maṃsyata iti ||
analyzed: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yogam āpsyate bhyavakāśe sa kau śikaḥ yogam āptu kāmaḥ yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam maṃsyate iti
mahāmudrā bhāvanā prati senā māyā tulyā nirabhre gagane bhagavatā uktā iti
evam pratyāhāreṇa dhyānena sevā aṅgam ucyate
tatas mṛta kuṇḍalī bimba saṃjñayā sandhyā bhāṣā antareṇa vāyuḥ iti uktam
tathā ca samāḥ jottare bhagavān āha
pañca ratna mayam śvāsam pañca vuḍaiḥ adhiṣṭhitam
niścārya piṇḍa rūpeṇa nāsikā agre vibhāvayet
iti

original: iha pañcaratnaśabdena rasanā pañcamaṇḍaladharmiṇī pṛthivyādi- pañcadhātavastanmayaṃ śvāsaṃ paśñścaratnamayamiti savyanāsāpuṭe |
analyzed: iha pañca ratna śabdena rasanā pañca maṇḍala dharmiṇī pṛthivī ādi pañca dhātavaḥ tad mayam śvāsam savya nāsā puṭe

original: tathā pañca- buddhā lalanā paśñścamaṇḍaladharmiṇo vijñānādipañcaskandhāḥ |
analyzed: tathā pañca buddhāḥ lalanā vijñāna ādi pañca skandhāḥ
taiḥ adhiṣṭhitam śvāsam vāma nāsāpuṭe iti
niścārya piṇḍa rūpeṇa iti

original: iha piṇḍaṃ savyā- vasavyamaṇḍalānātmakatvaṃ madhyamāyāmavadhūtyāṃ prāṇavāyoriti |
analyzed: iha piṇḍam savyā vasavya maṇḍala an ātmaka tvam madhyamāyām avadhūtyām prāṇa vāyoḥ iti

original: taṃ ca prāṇavāyuṃ niścārya piṇḍarūpeṇa nāsikāgre vibhāvayet |
analyzed: tam ca prāṇa vāyum niścārya piṇḍa rūpeṇa nāsikā agre vibhāvayet
atra nāsi kā śabdena nābhi hṛd kaṇṭha lalāṭa uṣṇīṣa kamala karṇikā ucyate
tasya agre ā vayet
nāsā agre bhāvayet
karṇikāt karṇikā madhye na mala dale iti
evam bindu sthāne piṇḍa rūpeṇa nirodhitaḥ prāṇaḥ
tena eva tasya dhāraṇā ucyate
evam aṅga dvayena upasādhanam amṛta kuṇḍalī bimbena iti
vajra jāpaḥ iti ucyate
madhyamā bhinna aṅgena japtavyam iti
a bhinna aṅgena karaṇena iti
prāṇasya na vāma dakṣiṇābhyām pracāraḥ iti

original: u- ṣṇīṣabimbe dṛṣṭe sati paścātprāṇāyāmaṃ kuryānmantrīti |
analyzed: u ṣṇīṣa bimbe dṛṣṭe sati paścāt prāṇāyāmam kuryāt mantrī iti
guru upadeśaḥ sandhyā bhāṣā antareṇa avagantavyaḥ iti
prāṇāyāma dhāraṇa upasādhanam ucyate
tatas sādhane devatā bimbam iti

original: iha dhāraṇābalena nābhisthāṃ caṇḍālīṃ jvalitāṃ paśyati yogī sarvāvaraṇarahitāṃ pratisenopamāṃ mahāmudrāmana- ntavuḍaraśmimeghān sphārayantīṃ prabhāmaṇḍalavirājitām |
analyzed: iha dhāraṇā balena nābhi sthām caṇḍālīm jvalitām paśyati yogī sarva āvaraṇa rahitām prati senā upamām mahā mudrām ananta vuḍa raśmi meghān sphārayantīm prabhā maṇḍala virājitām

original: tāmanusmṛtiṃ sādhanamāha dhāraṇānte caṇḍālīṃ yogī bhāvayediti niyamaḥ |
analyzed: tām anusmṛtim sādhanam āha dhāraṇa ante caṇḍālīm yogī bhāvayet iti niyamaḥ
tatas tasyāḥ jñāna arciṣā skandha dhātu āyatana ādīni dagdhāni ekalolībhavanti

original: vāmadakṣiṇanāḍīgatāni vijñānādīni pṛthivyādīni ca maṇḍalakhabhā- vāni lalāṭe candramaṇḍale praviṣṭāni |
analyzed: vāma dakṣiṇa nāḍī gatāni vijñāna ādīni pṛthivī ādīni ca lalāṭe candra maṇḍale praviṣṭāni

original: tataścaṇḍālyā jñānārciṣā candre drute sati yadbodhicittaṃ bindurūpeṇādhogataṃ kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhau guhyakamala ānandaparamaviramakhabhāvena |
analyzed: tatas caṇḍālyā jñāna arciṣā candre drute sati yat bodhi cittam bindu rūpeṇa adhas gatam kaṇṭhe hṛdi nābhau guhya kamale ānanda parama virama kha bhāvena
tatas vajramaṇi yāvat sahaja ānanda svabhāve na iti

original: athavā vicitravipākavimardavilakṣaṇasvabhāvenetyevaṃ ṣoḍaśa- kalāpūrṇa maṇyantargataṃ yadā sukhaṃ dadāti bhāvanābalena
analyzed: athavā vicitra vipāka vimarda vilakṣaṇa svabhāvena iti evam ṣoḍaśa maṇi antargatam yadā sukham dadāti bhāvanā balena

original: dṛśamiti dṛṣṭāntamātraṃ svarūpato dvīndriyajaṃ koṭīsahasrata- mīmapi kalāṃ nārhati paramākṣarasukhasyeni
analyzed: dṛśam iti dṛṣṭānta mātram svarūpataḥ dvi indriya jam mīm api kalām na arhati parama akṣara sukhasya ini

original: ihākṣarasukhāvasthā yā sa- hajānandarūpiṇī sāvasthā kāpyavijñeyā bālayoginām
analyzed: iha akṣara sukha avasthā yā sa hajānanda rūpiṇī sā avasthā kā api a vijñeyā bāla yoginām
bodhisattvaiḥ śūnyatā samādhiḥ iti ucyate
na punar laukika rūkhyā eva nāstikya artha anuyā
evam ṣaḍaṅga yogena buddha tvam yoginām sidhyati iti
sa sevā paścāmṛta ādyaiḥ jalanidhi kuliśaiḥ mantra jāpa ādibhiḥ ca pratyāhāra ra ādibhiḥ syāt kuliśa kamala jena amṛtena upasiddhiḥ

original: ānandādyaistrivajrā- bjasamarasagata bhāvanāsādhanaṃ syātprajñāsaṅge'cyutaṃ sambhavati khalu mahāsādhanaṃ sūkṣmayogāt
analyzed: bhāvanā sādhanam syāt prajñā saṅge cyutam sambhavati khalu mahāsādhanam sūkṣma yogāt

original: ihādikarmikeṇa prathamaṃ sevā kartavyā sā- dhanavidhinā sevā pañcāmṛtādyairiti
analyzed: iha ādi karmikeṇa prathamam sevā kartavyā sā dhana vidhinā sevā pañcāmṛta ādyaiḥ iti

original: bāhye paścāmṛtaṃ viḍādikamādya- śabdena gokādyastairbhakṣitaiḥ sevā devatātoṣanārtham
analyzed: bāhye paśca amṛtam viḍa ādikam ādya śabdena goka ādyaḥ taiḥ bhakṣitaiḥ sevā devatā toṣana artham
adhyātmani paścā mṛtāni pañca skandhāḥ
ādya śabdena pañca indriyāṇi pañca pradīpāḥ

original: teṣāṃ nirapekṣatā sevā śarīradravyatṛṣṇāparityāgastayā sevayā devatā varadā bhavanti na gūḍhādinā bhakṣiteneti
analyzed: teṣām nirapekṣa tā sevā śarīra dravya tṛṣṇā parityāgaḥ tayā sevayā devatāḥ vara dāḥ bhavanti na gūḍha ādinā bhakṣitena iti
jalanidhi kuliśaiḥ iti
kāya bhoga nirapekṣa tā
vāc bhoga nirapekṣa tā
citta bhoga nirapekṣa tā
cyavana sukha nirapekṣa tā sevā
maṃyamaḥ iti arthaḥ
anayā devatāḥ vara dāḥ bhavanti
na bhava bhoga spṛhayā iti
mantra jāpa ādibhiḥ ca iti
iha mantra jāpaḥ nāma prāṇasaṃyamaḥ

original: ādiśabdena recakapūrakakumbhaka- yogaḥ sadā sevā tayā devatā varadā bhavanti
analyzed: ādi śabdena recaka pūraka kumbhaka yogaḥ sadā sevā tayā devatāḥ vara dāḥ bhavanti

original: devatā na prāṇena yantri- lena vāgjalpiteneti nītārthaḥ
analyzed: devatā na prāṇena vāc jalpitena iti nīta arthaḥ
neyārthena punar akṣamālā ādinā jāpa ādikam kartavyam sāmānya siddhi artham
idānīm upasādhanam ucyate
pratyāhāraḥ ityādi

original: iha saṃsāriṇāmāhāraścakṣurādīndriyai rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇaṃ tatparityāgaḥ pratyāhāra ityucyate
analyzed: iha saṃsāriṇām āhāraḥ cakṣuḥ ādi indriyaiḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya grahaṇam tad parityāgaḥ pratyāhāraḥ iti ucyate

original: śūnyatāvimbe'nyaiścakṣurādibhirmāsādyairanyarūpā- diviṣayagrahaṇamupasādhanaṃ tathā dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmaśca dhāraṇā ca kuli- śakamalajenāmṛtenācyutenopasādhanaṃ nītārthena bāhye devatotsarjanena neyārthenetyupasādhanasiḍiḥ
analyzed: śūnyatā vimbe nyaiḥ cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ māsa ādyaiḥ anya rūpāḥ di viṣaya grahaṇam upasādhanam tathā dhyānam prāṇāyāmaḥ ca dhāraṇā ca kuli śa kamala jena amṛtena acyutena upasādhanam nīta
idānīm sādhanam ucyate

original: ihānande trivajrāḥ kāyavācittavindavo'bjasamarasagatā bhāvanā sā- dhanaṃ syādddannābhiguhye bindūnāṃ sthitirityarthaḥ
analyzed: iha ānande tri vajrāḥ bja sama rasa gatāḥ bhāvanā sā dhanam bindūnām sthitiḥ iti arthaḥ
evam sādhanam

original: tato mahāsādhanaṃ prajñāsaṅge'cyutaṃ sukhaṃ sambhavati yadā tadā khalu mahāsādhanaṃ sūkṣmayogamiti suṣumnānāḍikodhvai śukrasaṃyogānmahāsādhanamityucyate nītārthena
analyzed: tatas mahā sādhanam prajñā saṅge cyutam sukham sambhavati yadā tadā khalu mahā sādhanam sūkṣma yogam iti śukra saṃyogāt mahā sādhanam iti ucyate nīta arthena

original: neyārthena punaḥ prajñādharmodyanāsikāgre sarṣapādikamiti ni- yama evaṃ mahāsādhanaṃ bhavati
analyzed: neyārthena punar prajñādharma udya nāsikā agre sarṣapa ādikam iti yamaḥ evam mahā sādhanam bhavati
idānīm mṛdu ādi bhedena sevā ādikam ucyate

original: ādau vai śūnyatābodhirapi khalu tataḥ saṅgrahaścandrabindorbimbotpattiśca tasmātpravararasakulairakṣaranyāsa eva
analyzed: ādau vai śūnyatā bodhiḥ api khalu tatas saṅgrahaḥ candra bindoḥ bimba utpattiḥ ca tasmāt pravara rasa kulaiḥ akṣara nyāsaḥ eva

original: eṣā sāmānyasevā jalanidhiku- liśaiḥ sādhanaṃ madhyamaṃ cātropāyaścaturdhā bhavati mṛdudṛḍhaḥ sādhanāṅge ta- thaiva
analyzed: eṣā sāmānya sevā jalanidhi kuliśaiḥ sādhanam madhyamam ca atra upāyaḥ caturdhā bhavati mṛdu dṛḍhaḥ sādhana aṅge
iha utpatti krame prathamam śūnyatā bodhiḥ iti
prāṇinām maraṇa ante skandha parityāgāt utpatti aṃśika skandha grahaṇāt

original: yadantarālaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇa- mekaṃ tribhuvanadarśanaṃ tacchūnyamityucyate khalu niścitam
analyzed: yat antarālam śūnyatā lakṣaṇam ekam tribhuvana darśanam tat śūnyam iti ucyate khalu niścitam
tatas kṣaṇāt pa ścāt saṅgrahaḥ candra vindoḥ iti

original: ihālayavijñānasya mātṛgarbhe śukrabindūnāṃ grahaṇaṃ nāma saṅgrahaḥ
analyzed: iha ālayavijñānasya mātṛ garbhe śukra bindūnām grahaṇam nāma saṅgrahaḥ
tatas śukra ādi grahaṇāt tasmāt vimbotpattiḥ nāma sa samāsaiḥ garbha niṣpattiḥ kāya niṣpattiḥ iti arthaḥ
tatas pravara rasa kulaiḥ iti paśca skandhaiḥ cakṣuḥ ādīnām akṣara nyāsaḥ rūpa ādi viṣaya pravṛttiḥ iti
evam devatā sādhane kalpanām ekām bhāvayet ādikarmikaḥ

original: eṣā sāmānyasevā jala- nidhikuliśairiti kāyavāscittajñānavajraniṣpannaiḥ sādhanaṃ madhyamaṃ ca prāṇaniṣpattiḥ
analyzed: eṣā sāmānya sevā jala nidhi kuliśaiḥ iti sādhanam madhyamam ca prāṇa niṣpattiḥ
atra upāyaḥ caturdhā bhavati

original: sevāṅga upasādhanāṅge mṛdudṛḍha- sādhanāṅge tathaiva ṣoḍaśavarṣāvadheriti niyamaḥ
analyzed: sevā aṅge upasādhana aṅge sādhana aṅge tathā eva ṣoḍaśa varṣa avadheḥ iti niyamaḥ

original: atra mṛdurjātabālo dantotthānāttu madhyabālaḥ dantapātātkumāraḥ punardantotthānātṣoḍaśavarṣodhvaṃ prauḍhaḥ
analyzed: atra mṛduḥ jāta bālaḥ danta utthānāt tu madhya bālaḥ dantapātāt kumāraḥ punar danta utthānāt ṣoḍaśa varṣa ūdhvam prauḍhaḥ
putra duhitṛ janaka tvāt iti

original: evaṃ sarvadevatānāṃ caturvidha- maṅgaṃ yoginā bhāvanīyamiti laukikasatyaniyamaḥ
analyzed: evam sarva devatānām caturvidha maṅgam yoginā bhāvanīyam iti laukika satya niyamaḥ
idānīm paramārtha satyena vuddha bimba niṣpattiḥ ucyate
iha prathamam śūnyatā bodhiḥ iti
andha kāre na kiścid api cintanīyam
tatas saṅgrahaḥ candrabindoḥ iti
bindu paryantam dhūma ādi nimitta grahaṇam iti

original: bimbotpattiśca tasmāditi tasmā- hindorviśvadarśanaṃ bimbotpattiriti pravararasakulairiti
analyzed: bimba utpattiḥ ca tasmāt iti tasmai hindoḥ viśva darśanam bimba utpattiḥ iti pravara rasa kulaiḥ iti
nirāvaraṇaiḥ ṣaṣ kulaiḥ akṣaranyāsaḥ iti
prādeśika skandha dhātu āyatana ādīnām nirodhaḥ

original: tato mṛdvādibhedo bhūmilābhena bhavati yāvanna dvādaśabhūmīśvaro bhavati
analyzed: tatas mṛdu ādi bhedaḥ bhūmi lābhena bhavati yāvat na dvādaśa bhūmi īśvaraḥ bhavati
tatas dvādaśa ākāra satya arthaḥ ṣoḍaśa ākāra tattva vid hiṃśati ākāra sambodhi vivuddhaḥ sa rva vid paraḥ
iti niyamaḥ
idānīm pratyāhāra ādi phalam ucyate

original: pratyāhāreṇa yogī viṣayavirahito'dhiṣṭhayate sarvamantraiḥ paścābhijñānalābhī bhavati narapate dhyānayogena śuḍaḥ
analyzed: pratyāhāreṇa yogī viṣaya virahitaḥ dhiṣṭhayate sarva mantraiḥ paśca abhijñāna lābhī bhavati narapate dhyāna yogena śuḍaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmena śuḍaḥ śaśiravirahitaḥ pūjyate bodhisattvai- rmārakeśādināśaṃ viśati dābalaṃ dhāraṇāyā balena
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena śuḍaḥ śaśiḥ avirahitaḥ pūjyate bodhisattvaiḥ māra keśa ādi nāśam viśati dhāraṇāyāḥ balena

original: saṃśuddho'nusmṛteḥ syādvimalamapi ca bhāmaṇḍalaṃ jñānavimbāt tasmācchuḍaḥ samādhau katipayadivasaiḥ sidhyati jñānadehaḥ
analyzed: saṃśuddhaḥ nu smṛteḥ syāt vimalam api ca bhā maṇḍalam jñāna vimbāt tasmāt śuḍaḥ samādhau katipaya divasaiḥ sidhyati jñāna dehaḥ

original: pratyāhārādibhirvai yadi bhavati na sā mantriṇāmiṣṭasiddhi- rnādābhyāsāḍaṭhenāñjagakuliśamaṇau sādhayedvindurodhāt
analyzed: pratyāhāra ādibhiḥ vai yadi bhavati na sā mantriṇām iṣṭa siddhiḥ rnāda abhyāsāt ḍaṭhena añjaga kuliśa maṇau sādhayet vindu rodhāt

original: iha pratyāhāreṇa yadā yogī śuddho bhavati bimbena sthirībhūtena tadā sarvamantrairadhiṣṭhayate vacasā varadānādikaṃ dadāti
analyzed: iha pratyāhāreṇa yadā yogī śuddhaḥ bhavati bimbena sthirībhūtena tadā sarva mantraiḥ adhiṣṭhayate vacasā vara dāna ādikam dadāti

original: paścābhijñānalābhī bhavati narapate dhyānayogena śuddha iti
analyzed: paśca abhijñāna lābhī bhavati narapate dhyāna yogena śuddhaḥ iti

original: iha yadā'nimiṣacakṣurbhavati tadā divyacakṣurbhavatyevaṃ divyaśrotro dhyānena śuddho bhavati
analyzed: iha yadā nimiṣa cakṣuḥ bhavati tadā divya cakṣuḥ bhavati evam divya śrotraḥ dhyānena śuddhaḥ bhavati

original: prāṇāyā- mena śuddha iti yadā raviśaśimārgarahito yogī bhavati sadā madhya- māvāhastadā prāṇāyāmena śuḍaḥ san pūjyate bodhisattvaiḥ praśasyata ityarthaḥ
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena śuddhaḥ iti yadā ravi śaśi mārga rahitaḥ yogī bhavati sadā tadā prāṇāyāmena śuḍaḥ san pūjyate bodhisattvaiḥ praśasyate iti arthaḥ

original: mārakeśādināśaṃ viśati dāvalamiti śūnyatāvimbaṃ grā- hyagrāhakacittaṃ viśati dhāraṇāyā baleneti prāṇasya gatāgatakṣayeṇaika- lolībhavati
analyzed: māra keśa ādi nāśam viśati dāvalam iti śūnyatā vimbam grā hi a grāhaka cittam viśati dhāraṇāyāḥ balena iti prāṇasya gata āgata kṣayeṇa lolībhavati

original: saṃśuddho'nusmṛteriti vimbāliṅganaṃ cittasya sarvavika- lparahitatvaṃ tasmācchuḍo yadā tadā vimalaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalaṃ bhavati
analyzed: saṃśuddhaḥ nu smṛteḥ iti vimba āliṅganam cittasya sarva vikalpa rahita tvam tasmāt śuḍaḥ yadā tadā vimalam prabhā maṇḍalam bhavati
api ca śabdāt romakūpāt sphurat paśu ca raśmayaḥ niścaranti jñāna vimbāt
śūnya vimbāt iti
tasmāt śuḍaḥ samādhau iti

original: iha grāhyagrāhakacittayo- rekatvena yadakṣarasukhaṃ bhavati tatsukhaṃ samādhirucyate

evam dakṣiṇe pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa ākhya paśca dhātu vāhaḥ

original: madhye madhyamāmārge ṣaṣṭhaṃ jñānamaṇḍalamākāśādipaścamaṇḍalāt pratyekamaṇḍalasya sapādaikādaśaśvāsān gṛhītvā sapādakṣaṭpañcāśataṃ ca sātmakaṃ vahati |
analyzed: madhye madhyamā mārge ṣaṣṭham jñāna maṇḍalam ākāśa ādi paśca maṇḍalāt pratyeka maṇḍalasya sapāda ekādaśa śvāsān gṛhītvā sapāda kṣaṭpañcāśatam ca sātmakam vahati
āsām vāma dakṣiṇa madhya nāḍīnām ahorātreṇa ṣaṣṭi maṇḍala vāhaḥ

original: tatra nābhipadmadalasya vāmaṣaḍdaleṣu meṣamithunasiṃhatulādhanuḥ- kumbhātmakeṣu vijñānādipaścamaṇḍalakatvātriṃśanmaṇḍalānyevaṃ dakṣiṇa- ṣaḍdaleṣu vṛṣakarkaṭakanyāvṛścikamakara mīnātmakeṣu pratyekaṃ bhūmyādipaśca- maṇḍalātmakatvāt triṃśanmaṇḍalāni |
analyzed: tatra nābhi padma dalasya vāma ṣaṣ daleṣu meṣa mithuna siṃha tulādhanuḥ kumbha ātmakeṣu vijñāna ādi paśca maṇḍalaka tvāt triṃśat maṇḍalāni evam dakṣiṇa ṣaṣ daleṣu vṛṣa

original: tatra dakṣiṇe vṛṣādilagne yadā vahati vāyustadā mūle nāsāpuṭasyādhobhāge bhūmimaṇḍalaṃ daṇḍaikaṃ va- hatiḥ |
analyzed: tatra dakṣiṇe vṛṣa ādi lagne yadā vahati vāyuḥ tadā mūle nāsāpuṭasya adhobhāge bhūmi maṇḍalam daṇḍa ekam hatiḥ
evam tasya eva vāma bhāge nāsā vaṃśa pradeśe toya maṇḍalam
savye da kṣiṇa bhāge tejaḥ maṇḍalam ūrdhvabhāge vāyu maṇḍalam
madhye śūnya maṇḍalam

original: evamubhayornāsārandhrayorekaikamaṇḍalaṃ daṇḍāddaṇḍādanantaraṃ vahati pañcabhi- rdaṇḍaiḥ paścamaṇḍalaṃ vahatītyarthaḥ |
analyzed: evam ubhayoḥ nāsā randhrayoḥ ekaika maṇḍalam daṇḍāt daṇḍāt anantaram vahati pañcabhiḥ daṇḍaiḥ paśca maṇḍalam vahati iti arthaḥ
vāma puṭasya tu vakṣyati
dala madhya
ityādinā tad apekṣayā prāṇa randhrayoḥ iti uktam

original: ekā nāḍī kati śvāsānva- hati māsairdinatrayaṃ parivardhanā- dekādaśadalānyeṣa tyajedrarṣatrayaṃ kramāt

original: dvipuṭachā- daśarāśicakre pūrvādyekādaśadaleṣu trīṇi ṣaṇṇavadvādaśapañcadaśāṣṭāda- śaikaviṃśaticaturviṃśatisaptaviṃśatitriṃśattrayastriṃśadvādaśe tu vāmavā- hābhāvācchūnyaṃ bāhayadvādaśadaleṣu kramānmāsāstriṃśatsaptaviṃśaticaturvi- śatyekaviṃśatyaṣṭādaśapañcadaśadvādaśanavaṣaṭtrayaḥ

analyzed: ekādaśe tri māsa kṣaya sūcakam śūnyam dvādaśe dina dvayam karṇikāyām dinam ekam

analyzed: kaḥ eṣa bhūta naya ātmakaḥ samādhiḥ nāma yat satya dvayāḥ dvaidhīkāra lakṣaṇam

kim etat bhagavan satya dvayam nāma
prathamam saṃvṛti satyam dvitīyam paramārtha satyam ca iti
atas eva rūpa arūpa vinirmuktaḥ iti ucyate

original: pratisenāyāṃ hi darpaṇādyupalabhyamānaśarī- rāyāṃ na rūpalakṣaṇaṃ paramāṇudravyasandohābhāvāt |
analyzed: prati senāyām hi darpaṇa ādi upalabhyamāna śarī na rūpa lakṣaṇam paramāṇu dravya sandoha abhāvāt
na arūpa lakṣaṇam upalabhya mānasya durapakrama tvāt

original: tasmānna vimbaṃ bhavaṃ saṃsāramāyāti nirvāṇa tucchedaṃ yāti nākṣaramanyonyāliṅgitam |
analyzed: tasmāt na vimbam bhavam saṃsāram āyāti nirvāṇa tuccha idam yāti na akṣaram anyonya āliṅgitam

original: śāntamavikārīndriyavikārarahitatvā- didamevobhayātmakaṃ napuṃsakapadaṃ kevalamajñopāyapakṣayorabhāvātparamutkṛṣṭaṃ sa- kalajagadasādhāraṇatvānnanu mahāmudāsamutpannatvātsahajasya hetujatvaṃ mahā- mudrāyāśca hetutvamevaṃ hi hetuḥ phalaṃ ca chayamapyanatikrāntamataḥ karmamudrā jñānamudrā ca heturastu mahāsudrāyā api ko vai viśeṣa ityāha |
analyzed: śāntam avikāri indriya vikāra rahita tvāt idam eva ubhaya ātmakam napuṃsaka padam kevalam ajña upāya pakṣayoḥ abhāvāt param utkṛṣṭam sa kala jagat asādhāraṇa tvāt nanu mahā mudā

original: prajñetyādi prajñā vimbalakṣaṇā sarvākārā'vayodharūpiṇī sarvadharmaśūnyatā sā ca hetoḥ sakāśānna samsūtā na jātā'kṛtatvātprakṛteḥ paramārthato yadapi- prajñāhetūdbhavaṃ phalaṃ prajñājātamityabhidhīyate tadapi na hetujamiti prajñā- hetujaṃ na bhavati kutaḥ prajñāhetorna jātatvātprajñāyā ahetujatvātphalamapi sahajākhyaṃ kathamiva hetujaṃ bhavitumarhati prāgeva hetukathāyā nirāsāt |
analyzed: prajñā ityādi prajñā vimba lakṣaṇā sarva ākārā vayodha rūpiṇī sarva dharma śūnyatā sā ca hetoḥ sakāśāt na samsūtā na jātā kṛta tvāt prakṛteḥ paramārthataḥ yat api prajñā hetu

original: ato'smātkaraṇādyadakṣaraṃ jñānaṃ tatprajñājñānaṃ na hetujaṃ tataśca hetuphala- bhāvābhāvātphalenaiva heturmudrito hetunaiva vā phalamityanyonyamapi na bhavati|
analyzed: atas smāt karaṇāt yat akṣaram jñānam tat prajñā jñānam na hetu jam tatas ca hetu phala bhāva abhāvāt phalena eva hetuḥ mudritaḥ hetunā eva vā phalam iti anyonyam api na bhavati

original: phalenāpi heturmudrito hetunāpi phalamiti parasparamapi na bhavati kuta ityāha |
analyzed: phalena api hetuḥ mudritaḥ hetunā api phalam iti parasparam api na bhavati kutas iti āha
hetuḥ ityādi
yatas hetu phale pratītyasamutpanna tvāt saṃvṛte tasya lokottara tvena an ādi nidhana tvāt

original: ato'nyonyamudritamubhayābhinnayuganaḍā- khyaṃ vimbaṃ notpannaṃ na ca nirvṛtamutpādvyayarahitam |
analyzed: atas nyonya mudritam ubhaya abhinna yuga naḍā khyam vimbam na utpannam na ca nirvṛtam utpāda vyaya rahitam
uktam ca

original: utpādādvā tathāgatānā manutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti |
analyzed: utpādāt vā tathāgatānām anutpādāt vā tathāgatānām sthitā eva eṣā dharmāṇām dharma tā iti
yata śvas ubhaya abhinna bimbasya prajñā bhāgaḥ ādi śānta tvāt nitya anutpannaḥ
upāya bhāgaḥ tu eva

original: tato'pi na hetuphalatvaṃ nāpi paraspara mudraṇam |
analyzed: na hetu phala tvam na api paraspara mudraṇam
anyonya mudrita tve yutkti antaram āha
ajātasya ityādi

sva cittam eva traidhātuka ākāra tayā bahis vibhaktam evā upalabhyate
na sva cittāt anyat yāoganaḥ tadānīm sva para vibhāga kalpa abhāvāt
uktam ca he vajre svarga matyaiḥ ca pātālaiḥ eka mūrtiḥ bhavet kṣaṇāt
sva para bhāga vikalpena bādhitum nā eva śakyate
iti
bāhya jñeyam pṛthakkṛtvā na ityādi upasaṃhāraḥ
kim chinatti ityādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: nanu mahāmudrāyā ajātatvāt phalamapyasa- mbhāvi na hyanutpannasya kasyaciddharmasya kiṃcideva phalamanubhūyate kaiścidapī- tyāha |
analyzed: nanu mahāmudrāyāḥ ajāta tvāt phalam api asambhāvi na hi anutpannasya kasyacid dharmasya kiṃcid eva phalam anubhūyate kaiścid api iti āha
bandhyā ityādi

original: anutpannāyā api bandhyāduhituḥ saṃyoge svapnakāle saukhyaṃ yadanubhūyate |
analyzed: anutpannāyāḥ api bandhyāduhituḥ saṃyoge svapna kāle saukhyam yat anubhūyate
tad ākāśa udbhava bimba sevanāt phala rūpam sahaja sukham yogibhiḥ saṃvedyate eva

original: na hi prajñopāyendriyānutpannaṃ mahāmudrāsa- mutpannamivākāśamivāvaraṇavarjitaṃ sarvabhūtasthamatattvavidbhirvedyate |
analyzed: na hi prajñā upāya indriya anutpannam mahāmudrā sa mutpannam iva ākāśam iva āvaraṇa varjitam sarva bhūta stham a tattva vidbhiḥ vedyate

original: nanu tathāgatenoktaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanābhāve dvīndriyasaṃyogarahitaṃ prajñājñānaṃ svasaṃvedyaṃ na bhavatyacyutatvāt |
analyzed: nanu tathāgatena uktam skandha dhātu āyatana abhāve dvi indriya saṃyoga rahitam prajñā jñānam sva saṃvedyam na bhavati acyuta tvāt

original: kathaṃ svācattapratibhāse svacittenānuṣaṅgaṃ kṛtvā svacittaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ karoti mahākṣarasukhajñānaṃ copabhuṃkte |
analyzed: katham svācatta pratibhāse sva cittena anuṣaṅgam kṛtvā sva cittam nirāvaraṇam karoti mahā akṣara sukha jñānam ca upabhuṃkte
paramāṇu sandoha śarīra abhāvāt

original: etadeva viparītaṃ devadatta ātmanaḥ skandhamāruhya grāmaṃ gacchatīti vākyavat |
analyzed: etat eva viparītam devadattaḥ ātmanaḥ skandham āruhya grāmam gacchati iti vākya vat
iha kasyacid abhiprāyaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tasmāducyata iha hi yadvaktavyaṃ mūkhaiḥ paramāṇusandohātmakaiḥ skandhadhātvāyatanairvinā cittamātreṇa prajñā- jñānaṃ svasaṃvedyaṃ na bhavati tanna kasmādāgantukacittavāsanāvaśāt |
analyzed: tasmāt ucyate iha hi yat vaktavyam mūkhaiḥ paramāṇu sandoha ātmakaiḥ skandha dhātu āyatanaiḥ vinā cittamātreṇa prajñā jñānam sva saṃvedyam na bhavati tat na kasmāt āgantuka citta vāsanā vaśāt

original: iha skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ nāmāgantukacittavāsanā tasyāḥ prasādena citte sukha- duḥkhacittavāsanā praviśati |
analyzed: iha skandha dhātu āyatanam nāma āgantuka citta vāsanā tasyāḥ prasādena citte sukha duḥkha citta vāsanā praviśati

original: paramārthato vicāryamāṇenāsya śarīrasya kṣudropadravaḥ kaścidasti yena citte duḥkhaṃ praviśati|
analyzed: paramārthataḥ vicāryamāṇena asya śarīrasya kṣudra upadravaḥ kaścid asti yena citte duḥkham praviśati

original: iha sarvalokeṣu prasiddhaṃ tasyāmevāvasthāyāmanyacittavāsanātmakaṃ śarīraṃ paramāṇusandoharahitaṃ deśāntaraṃ vrajatpratibhāsate |
analyzed: iha sarva lokeṣu prasiddham tasyām eva avasthāyām anya citta vāsanā ātmakam śarīram paramāṇu sandoha rahitam deśa antaram vrajat pratibhāsate

original: tasya deśāntaraṃ vrajataḥ śarīre caurādibhi- rupadrave kṛte sati tenopadraveṇa citte duḥkhaṃ praviśati tena duḥkhenākrandati |
analyzed: tasya deśa antaram vrajataḥ śarīre caura ādibhiḥ upadrave kṛte sati tena upadraveṇa citte duḥkham praviśati tena duḥkhena ākrandati

original: tadidaṃ mahadadbhutaṃ śarīraṃ vinā caurādibhirvinā svasaṃvedyaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ pravartate |
analyzed: tat idam mahat adbhutam śarīram vinā caura ādibhiḥ vinā sva saṃvedyam duḥkha jñānam pravartate
cittasya evam khapne mahā kāma upabhogaiḥ citte sukham praviśati

original: tade- vāścaryaśarīreṇa vinā kāmopabhogairvinā svasaṃvedyaṃ sukhajñānaṃ cittasya pravartate sattvānāmiti |
analyzed: vinā kāma upabhogaiḥ vinā sva saṃvedyam sukha jñānam cittasya pravartate sattvānām iti

original: etadeva paṇḍitairvicārayituṃ na śakyate prādeśika- jñānamapi |
analyzed: etat eva paṇḍitaiḥ vicārayitum na śakyate prādeśika jñānam api

original: kiṃ punaḥ saṃsāravāsanātikrāntaṃ nirvāṇavāsanodbhūtaṃ yogi- svasaṃvedyaṃ samantabhadramahākṣarasukhajñānaṃ vitarkayituṃ śakyate mūkhairiti |
analyzed: kim punar saṃsāra vāsanā atikrāntam nirvāṇa vāsanā udbhūtam yogi sva saṃvedyam samanta bhadra mahā akṣara sukha jñānam vitarkayitum śakyate mūkhaiḥ iti
yat api prajñā upāya abhinnam iti ucyate tat api paramārthataḥ na asti iti āha
na prajñā ityādi

original: na prajñā nāpyupāyaḥ pṛthagbhūto rāśirasti yena tadbhinnaṃ bodhicittaṃ syāttasyā avasthāyā bālayogibhiravijñeyatvātsahaja ityapi prajñayā dhiyā sahajatattvāducyata āsamantātsukhāpūrṇāvasthālābhātsa- vairāvaraṇai rāgādikleśajñeyādibhirvirahito nirṇayaḥ |
analyzed: na prajñā nā api upāyaḥ pṛthak bhūtaḥ rāśiḥ asti yena tat bhinnam bodhi cittam syāt tasyāḥ avasthāyāḥ bāla yogibhiḥ avijñeya tvāt sahajaḥ iti api prajñayā dhiyā sahaja tattvāt ucyate ā
kara ādi sparśāḥ bhāvāt

original: grāhyagrāhakavaidhuryādviṣayendriyavarjitaḥ sarvavyāpakatvātsarvataḥ sarvākārajñatvātsarvabhūtasthaḥ kālatraye'pi paramāṇudharmatātikrāntatvāda- vidyā'jñānakartikayā'chedyo vijñānadharmatātītatvādyāhyagrāhakoṭyā'bhe- dyatvāṅgedavarjitaḥ svayambhūrityādiślokatrayaṃ lokottaraṣaṭsattvoddeśo'nu- tpādānirodhatvātsvayambhūḥ |
analyzed: grāhya grāhaka vaidhuryāt viṣaya indriya varjitaḥ sarva vyāpaka tvāt sarvatas sarva ākāra jña tvāt sarva bhūta sthaḥ kāla traye a vidyā jñāna kartikayā chedyaḥ vijñāna dharmatā atīta tva
mahārthaḥ jagat artha kāri tvāt

original: asya nirdeśo vajramityādivajraṃ śūnyavimbaṃ tadyasmā- dabhedyaṃ tasmānmahārtha mahodeśo yaḥ satvaḥ kāmadhātvādirūpakāyavāk- cittaikatvākhyaḥ sa paramākṣaramuddiśyata iti vajrasatvaḥ |
analyzed: asya nirdeśaḥ vajram ityādi vajram śūnya vimbam tat yasmāt tasmāt mahārtha mahodeśaḥ yaḥ satvaḥ kāmadhātu ādi rūpa kāya vāc citta ekatva ākhyaḥ sa paramākṣaram uddiśyate iti vajra

original: yadvā vajramabhedyaṃ kāyavāñcittaikarasaṃ mahāsukhajñānaṃ sattvaṃ tribhavasyaikatā jñeyamābhyāmaikyaṃ paramākṣaraṃ sa mahānmahāsukhapūrṇatvānmahārāgaṃ uddiṣṭaḥ sa ca sattvo bhūmibhiḥ pūrṇatvātsarvasattvaratiṅkara uddiṣṭa iti mahāsattvaḥ |
analyzed: yat vā vajram abhedyam kāyavān citta ekarasam mahā sukha jñānam sattvam tri bhavasya ekatā jñeyam ābhyām aikyam paramākṣaram sa mahān mahā sukha pūrṇa tvāt mahārāgam uddiṣṭaḥ sa ca

original: yadvā mahacchabdenātra paramākṣarasukhaṃ tena pūrṇo yaḥ sattvo bhūmibhiśca sa mahāsattvaḥ |
analyzed: yat vā mahat śabdena atra parama akṣara sukham tena pūrṇaḥ yaḥ sattvaḥ bhūmibhiḥ ca sa mahāsattvaḥ

original: yato'sau bodhau śūnyatākaruṇātmi- kāyā~ dharmacakre sthito'calasthitaḥ |
analyzed: bodhau cala sthitaḥ
kleśa ādi rūpa dveṣa saṃghānām vijayi tvāt mahādveṣaḥ mahāripuḥ ca uddiṣṭaḥ
tatas sattvaḥ iti bodhisattvaḥ

original: sa yataḥ samayasya candrāmṛtākhyaśukrasya sukhe'cyutirūpaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ mohavi- jayitvānmahāmoho mūḍhadhiyāṃ mohaghātakaścoddiṣṭastataḥ samayasattvaḥ |
analyzed: sa yatas samayasya candra amṛta ākhya śukrasya sukhe cyuti rūpam bhakṣaṇam jayitvāt mahāmohaḥ mūḍha dhiyām moha ghātakaḥ ca uddiṣṭaḥ tatas samayasattvaḥ
sā eva

original: yataḥ kāyādivajrāṇāṃ prajñayā vimbenākṣaravindubhiśca sahayoga ekatvam
analyzed: yatas kāya ādi vajrāṇām prajñayā vimbena akṣara vindubhiḥ ca saha yogaḥ eka tvam

original: yataḥ sa kālo mahāsukhaṃ tasmādupāyādaparityakta vakrākhyā- ntarasattvārthī bhagavān
analyzed: yatas sa kālaḥ mahā sukham tasmāt upāyāt aparityakta vakra ākhyā antara sattva arthī bhagavān

original: ata eva sattvānmocayitvā mahālobhaḥ kṣaralo- bhavātakaścopadiṣṭa iti kālacakraḥ
analyzed: atas eva sattvān mocayitvā mahā lobhaḥ kṣaralaḥ bhavātakaḥ ca upadiṣṭaḥ iti kālacakraḥ

original: ṣaṇṇāḍīrūpabaḍāracakre'mī vajrasattvā- dyaḥ pratyekaṃ ṣaṭprakārāstatrādhaḥ śaṃkhinīrūpāre'kṣarajñānaṃ rasanārūpakṣi- ṇāre'kṣara vedanā'vadhūtīrūpodhvīre'kṣaravijñānam

te eva ṣaḍ kulāni yathākramam
akṣara jñāna ādi ba dhātūnām
evam akṣara manaḥ ādi ṣaṣ indriyāṇām

original: indriyopalakṣaṇādakṣara divyendriyapāṇyupasthapāyuvā pādākhyakarmendriyā- ṇāṃ tathā viṣayopalakṣaṇādakṣaracyutiḥ
analyzed: indriya upalakṣaṇāt akṣara divya indriya pāṇi upastha pāyu vā pāda ākhya karmendriyāḥ tathā viṣaya upalakṣaṇāt akṣara cyutiḥ

original: ādānasūtrastrāvaviḍḍutsargā- lā pagatyākhyakarmendriyakriyāṇāmetāni ṣaṭtriṃśatkrameṇa maṇḍale mahā- kāyākhyavajrasattvamahārāgākṣararatneśamahākrodha
analyzed: ādāna sūtra strā va viṣ utsargāḥ lā pa gati ākhya karmendriya kriyāṇām etāni ṣaṭtriṃśat krameṇa maṇḍale mahā kāya ākhya vajra sattva mahārāga akṣara ratneśa mahākrodha
kṣobhya mahāmoha ākhya vaira rocana mahādveṣa ākhyā moghasiḍi mahālobha ākhyā amita ābhāḥ
prajñāpāramitā pāṇḍarā vajradhātu īśvarī locanā tārā māmakyaḥ
samantabhadra kṣitigarbha vajrapāṇi sarva nicara gaviṣkambhīkha garbha loka īśvarāḥ
śabda vajra a rasa vajra a dharma dhātu vajra gandha vajra a sparśa vajra a rūpa vajrāḥ
śumbha prajñāntaka uṣṇīṣa yamāntaka vighnāntaka padmāntakāḥ
mahānīlā jamminī raudrākṣī śumbhinī mahāvīryā amāḥ ninyaḥ
ayam ca citta citta vajraḥ
sa āvaraṇa rāga ādi nirodhāt krodha rāj mahā kāma ādi ṣaṇmukhaḥ
mṛtyumāra ādīnām bhayāḥ naka tvāt bhīmaḥ

original: uktajñānādiṣaṭkulaiḥ śodhitaḥ kāya iti kāyamaṇḍalaṃ guhye- ndriyavāṅmaṇḍalacittamaṇḍalametattrayātmakaṣaṭkulamaṇḍalaṃ tanmārgabhāva- nayā śuddhaṃ sahaviśuḍānāṃ pūrvoktaprajñopāyatrivajrāṇāṃ vajrasattvatvamaci- ttavajratvaṃ niṣpādayet
analyzed: ukta jñāna ādi ṣaṣ kulaiḥ śodhitaḥ kāyaḥ iti kāya maṇḍalam guhye indriya vāc maṇḍala citta maṇḍalam etat traya ātmaka ṣaṣ kula maṇḍalam tad mārga bhāva nayā śuddham saha

original: idaṃ sekoddeśākhyaprakaraṇamuktaṃ daśābhiṣekasā- dhanaṃ paramākṣarābhiṣekasādhanaṃ coktam

sa darbha dyotinī śuḍā upahā
haratu eṣā jagat tāpam seka indu jñāna candrikā
iti seka uddeśa ṭīkā samāptā
kṛtiḥ iyam pādānām
